item.name: Allocations
item.description: fabric **Allocations** API lets retailers manage allocation for existing orders. Allocations serve as records of the locations from which an order is fulfilled. The user of the Allocation service is a Warehouse Management Service (WMS) or Point of Sale Service (POS).

description.content: Search for inventory allocations based on the matching filter criteria.

fabric **Allocations** API lets retailers manage allocation for existing orders. Allocations serve as records of the locations from which an order is fulfilled. The user of the Allocation service is a Warehouse Management Service (WMS) or Point of Sale Service (POS).
